title: Bill Signed: H.R. 6256 | The White House
content: On Thursday, December 23, 2021, the President signed into law:H.R. 6256, which bans imports from the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region (Xinjiang) of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China and imposes sanctions on foreign individuals responsible for forced labor in the region,Thank you to Speaker Pelosi, Leader Schumer, Representatives McGovern and Chris Smith, and Senators Merkley and Rubio for their leadership.
